title: We of the West Riding
creator_credit: Ken Annakin, Ralph Keene and Greenpark Productions
brief_description: Yorkshire, its people, factories and wild moorland scenery. We are shown the country in which the Bronte sisters were born and its influence on their famous novel. Finally the chorus of the Chapel Choir sings the Hallelujah Chorus from Handel’s “Messiah”.
